meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>group</kanji> that's <kanji>weave</kanji>d together so tightly with hierarchy and everything else is a little more complicated than a group. It's an <vocabulary>organization</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. You didn't learn that reading for 組, so here's a mnemonic to help: 

You start an <vocabulary>organization</vocabulary> for <reading>so</reading>ap (そ). You're all about soap and making it more effective through your organization. So you call it the Soap Organization for Antiseptic Progress, or S.O.A.P. for short.
